submission:
from sortedcontainers import SortedList
class Solution:
    def minimumDistance(self, points: List[List[int]]) -> int:
        n=len(points)
        asum,adiff=SortedList(),SortedList()
        for i,(x,y) in enumerate(points):
            points[i]=(x+y,x-y)
            asum.add(x+y)
            adiff.add(x-y)
        res=inf
        for i,(x,y) in enumerate(points):
            asum.remove(x)
            adiff.remove(y)
            res=min(res,max(asum[-1]-asum[0],adiff[-1]-adiff[0]))
            asum.add(x)
            adiff.add(y)
        return res
